issue.title: [Python] Opt-in to PyArrow parquet build rather than skipping silently on failure
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-323](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-323). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
If you want to build the Parquet support for pyarrow, currently failure will pass silently. It would be better to opt-in to the extension build and get a hard failure if there is something misconfigured about your environment.
